channel.title: [req] List of ALL the ports a private server uses
channel.description:
I use a belkin 802.11g wireless router. I have signed up with no-ip. But nobody can connect to my server because my router is blocking people coming in. NOTE: the private server is not on the computer the router is connected to, its connected to my computer upstairs. So, i was wondering if I can have a list of all the ports than can/will be used with my server :)
NOTE: I am using WhiteScape server source.
Help would be highly appreciated :cool:

item.title: [req] List of ALL the ports a private server uses
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

you can use any open port just tell the people connecting to change their port on the client

Read full topic
item.source: [req] List of ALL the ports a private server uses

item.description:
@danward wrote:

ok do you know how to set up port forwarding?
